thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Javam

author: Javam
title: Javam
text: We were able to find the exact flight that we were looking for. I loved how they gave us a grid under the Flexible Dates tab. Using the grid we were able to get the exact days and times that we wanted to fly without having to enter our information multiple times. We got the airline that we wanted, on the travel days that we wanted, and at the price we wanted. We even were able to get times that worked well with our busy schedule.
